function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate hospital preparation for the coronavirus pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trained rapid-response team to deal with suspected cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures for medical staff and patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper equipment in ambulances and morgues for infection control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of adequate training and education for healthcare teams on dealing with covid-19","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation facilities and organizational support in hospitals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Multiple zones in the hospital may lead to cross-contamination if not managed effectively.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and collaboration may lead to confusion and errors in patient care.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective communication and collaboration among healthcare professionals","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to preventive supplies and antiseptics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of support for isolated workers and those with chronic diseases","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of pandemic preparedness plan","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate supply of preventive supplies and antiseptics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring and surveillance in isolation hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate coordination of health services resulting in inadequate responses to health emergencies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of nursing staff due to fear of infection and lack of clear plan for dealing with covid-19 pandemic","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of nursing staff due to transportation challenges and curfew restrictions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Change in work schedules due to curfew restrictions","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased working hours and vacation time for nurses","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exchange of nurses to address shortages","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological problems such as panic, fear, anxiety, and depression among staff nurses","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global misinformation and the ’infodemic’","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparation to deal with psychological problems","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on the psychological well-being of nurses during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures in hospitals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient supply of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of training and education on pandemic preparedness and infection control","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate availability of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor communication and collaboration between nursing and medical management teams","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication and collaboration between nurses and physicians in a civil environment","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate material support for healthcare workers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weakness in hospital services during a crisis","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Qualitative research may introduce bias due to subjective approach","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited scope of study with focus on nursing managers only","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in crisis management during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of infection leading to absenteeism among nurses","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infections among nurses due to exposure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in work productivity due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Undermined workplace collaboration and community interactions","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in workplace management during and after the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic spreading at an unprecedented speed","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Organizations entering different stages of workplace management during the pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infectious disease outbreaks and epidemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Workplace may not implement proper hazard reduction measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of alignment with corporate strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate office workplace modification practices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of external business environment on corporate mission and strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proactive response to external forces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of management principles for crem strategic alignment","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive strategic alignment models","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
